title: Attention cord-cutters: HBO Now is finally live in the Roku store
text:
Attention cord-cutters: HBO Now is finally live in the Roku store 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Ever since HBO announced last spring its cable-free streaming service, HBO Now, cord-cutters around the world have been waiting for it to la...
